name: Planar Portal
flavorText: You inscribe a circle of runes on the ground. The earth shakes as the portal blazes with magical energy. A hazy image of a distant world appears within the circle’s bounds.
text: This ritual works the same as Linked Portal, except that you can use it to travel to other planes. As with Linked Portal, your planar destination must have a permanent teleportation circle whose sigil sequence you have memorized.  Your Arcana check determines how long the portal remains open.  Arcana Check Result Portal Duration 19 or lower 1 round 20–39 3 rounds 40 or higher 5 rounds  When you first learn this ritual, you learn the sigil sequences of two common planar locations, as determined by the DM.
